page.title: 18VILLAGE NEWSLETTER
page.content: "Life Together" is a village newsletter produced by the Swan group of parishes and distributed to every home. Here are a few items from the July edition. Charndon Community Association - Junior Disco. Edgcott Church Fete at Rectory Farm. Marsh Gibbon Scout Group - Barn Dance with live Country and Western Band. Marsh Gibbon Youth Club are trying to start a BMX team and need land for a course. Mothers and Toddlers Club - Talk on Cystic Fibrosis in Children. Thanks from village people for help during illness and bereavement. A free rubbish skip will be provided for large items not collected by the normal weekly service. List of church services for July and August.
